dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse 2087]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 10, 2006 9:11 AM
To: EBooth@irdeto.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse 2087]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Abuse 2087
Date: Tue, 10 Jan 2006 13:48:07 +0100
From: Esmeralda Booth <EBooth@irdeto.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear Internet-Provider,



I am writing this letter of complaint on behalf of Irdeto-Access B.V.



In searching the Internet we found a site that is abusing the rights of
Irdeto-Access BV.



The site/URL is:



<http://china-sinotel.em/>

http://www.diesl.com/web/index.php?page=segunda_ver2&tienda=1&pid=379



The site proposes new versions of Mvision decoders with Irdeto card sharing
support.



I would like to draw your attention to this Internet site, which is in
conflict with the law and an abuse of the 'Intellectual Property Rights'
of Irdeto Access B.V. .



Before taking any legal action I would like to ask you to close the site and
to provide us with the name and contact details of the owner of the
site/URL.



We understand that it is probably not possible for you to check all your
customers, however if this letter does not elicit a positive response, we
will have to hold you responsible for the violation of the rights of Irdeto
Access BV.





Yours faithfully



Esmeralda Booth

Irdeto Access

Jupiterstraat 42

2132HD Hoofddorp

(The Netherlands)

Tel: +31 235562580






- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDw86evK/XpJs6oyURAv05AKCiRgJNFDiacoPmlgW7GTisLkoKPACeKqDG
Ld6B6408SfsRg4/6D29idMQ=
=vk/i
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
